337430.name: Sign Motion Demo
337430.description: For a long, long time they have been bound by rules and assumptions. Trapped within the boundaries of signs. Until one day, the kid from the school crossing sign is thrown out – unleashing a new world – the world of Sign Motion. Where will the kid go now? Will others follow, help or oppose?
337430.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
